pages.text: A rare and valuable mineral found exclusively in the End, Xaenon Ore yields $(l:contentcraft:xaenon/raw_xaenon)Raw Xaenon$() when mined. For more efficient processing, the ore can be smelted directly into $(l:contentcraft:xaenon/xaenon_ingot)Xaenon Ingots$().
Xaenon Ore generates in the End's lower strata, typically between Y-levels 20 and 40. Its extreme rarity makes each discovery particularly valuable.
